page.title: 03BLEAK HOUSE PENRITH
page.content: There are 14 council caravans.The travellers are people who have a caravan at the site to live in but go abroad to sell their wares in the summer.Their caravans are very smart with lots of silver and crystal in them.There are mirrors engraved with flowers and silver panels on the wall.The seats are covered with velvet and the carpet deep and plush.There are no beds but they pull out the sofas to sleep on.They wash their hands and wipe their shoes every time they go in and look and sound well- mannered and tidy.But with not going to school,as soon as they are outside their caravans the fighting and the indescribable language begins.It can be nice living there but at times it is like living in a goldfish bowl.
